description: Returns a list of image scan findings for your account.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An array of name value pairs that you can use to filter your results. You can use the following filters to streamline results: imageBuildVersionArn imagePipelineArn vulnerabilityId severity If you don't request a filter, then all findings in your account are listed. (dict) --- A name value pair that Image Builder applies to streamline results from the vulnerability scan findings list action. name (string) --- The name of the image scan finding filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: findings
nested_items.description: The image scan findings for your account that meet your request filter criteria.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that's associated with the finding.

nested_items.name: imageBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image build version that's associated with the finding.

nested_items.name: imagePipelineArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image pipeline that's associated with the finding.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the finding. Image Builder looks for findings of the type PACKAGE_VULNERABILITY that apply to output images, and excludes other types.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the finding.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the finding.

nested_items.name: remediation
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details about how to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about the recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: A link to more information about the recommended remediation for this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the finding.

nested_items.name: firstObservedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the finding was first observed.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the finding was last updated.

nested_items.name: inspectorScore
nested_items.description: The score that Amazon Inspector assigned for the finding.

nested_items.name: inspectorScoreDetails
nested_items.description: An object that contains details of the Amazon Inspector score.

nested_items.name: adjustedCvss
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about an adjustment that Amazon Inspector made to the CVSS score for the finding.

nested_items.name: scoreSource
nested_items.description: The source for the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: cvssSource
nested_items.description: The source of the finding.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The CVSS version that generated the score.

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: The CVSS score.

nested_items.name: scoringVector
nested_items.description: A vector that measures the severity of the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: adjustments
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about an adjustment that Amazon Inspector made to the CVSS score for the finding.

nested_items.name: metric
nested_items.description: The metric that Amazon Inspector used to adjust the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the CVSS score adjustment.

nested_items.name: packageVulnerabilityDetails
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details of a package vulnerability finding.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilityId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: vulnerablePackages
nested_items.description: The packages that this vulnerability impacts.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: sourceLayerHash
nested_items.description: The source layer hash of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: epoch
nested_items.description: The epoch of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: release
nested_items.description: The release of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: arch
nested_items.description: The architecture of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: packageManager
nested_items.description: The package manager of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The file path of the vulnerable package.

nested_items.name: fixedInVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the package that contains the vulnerability fix.

nested_items.name: remediation
nested_items.description: The code to run in your environment to update packages with a fix available.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the vulnerability information.

nested_items.name: cvss
nested_items.description: CVSS scores for one or more vulnerabilities that Amazon Inspector identified for a package.

nested_items.name: baseScore
nested_items.description: The CVSS base score.

nested_items.name: scoringVector
nested_items.description: The vector string of the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The CVSS version that generated the score.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the CVSS score.

nested_items.name: relatedVulnerabilities
nested_items.description: Vulnerabilities that are often related to the findings for the package.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sourceUrl
nested_items.description: A link to the source of the vulnerability information.

nested_items.name: vendorSeverity
nested_items.description: The severity that the vendor assigned to this vulnerability type.

nested_items.name: vendorCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when this vulnerability was first added to the vendor's database.

nested_items.name: vendorUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the vendor last updated this vulnerability in their database.

nested_items.name: referenceUrls
nested_items.description: Links to web pages that contain details about the vulnerabilities that Amazon Inspector identified for the package.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: fixAvailable
nested_items.description: Details about whether a fix is available for any of the packages that are identified in the finding through a version update.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for paginated responses. When this field isn't empty, there are additional elements that the service hasn't included in this request. Use this token with the next request to retrieve additional objects.
